ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[$0]) SortRel(sort0=[$1], sort1=[$0], dir0=[Ascending], dir1=[Descending]) ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[+($0, 1)], DEPTNO=[$7]) TableAccessRel(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testOrderByNegativeOrdinal
TestCase.Resource: select empno + 1, deptno, empno from emp order by -1 desc

ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[$0], DEPTNO=[$1], EMPNO=[$2]) SortRel(sort0=[$3], dir0=[Descending]) ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[+($0, 1)], DEPTNO=[$7], EMPNO=[$0], EXPR$3=[-1]) TableAccessRel(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[$0], DEPTNO=[$1], EMPNO=[$2]) SortRel(sort0=[$3], dir0=[Descending]) ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[+($0, 1)], DEPTNO=[$7], EMPNO=[$0], EXPR$3=[+(1, 2)]) TableAccessRel(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testOrderByAliasDoesNotObscure
TestCase.Resource: select empno + 1 as empno, empno - 2 as y from emp order by empno + 3
ProjectRel(EMPNO=[$0], Y=[$1]) SortRel(sort0=[$2], dir0=[Ascending]) ProjectRel(EMPNO=[+($0, 1)], Y=[-($0, 2)], EXPR$2=[+($0, 3)]) TableAccessRel(table=[[SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testOrderByAliasInExpr
TestCase.Resource: select empno + 1 as x, empno - 2 as y from emp order by y + 3
ProjectRel(X=[$0], Y=[$1]) SortRel(sort0=[$2], dir0=[Ascending]) ProjectRel(X=[+($0, 1)], Y=[-($0, 2)], EXPR$2=[+(-($0, 2), 3)]) TableAccessRel(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testOrderByAliasOverrides
TestCase.Resource: select empno + 1 as empno, empno - 2 as y from emp order by empno + 3
ProjectRel(EMPNO=[$0], Y=[$1]) SortRel(sort0=[$2], dir0=[Ascending]) ProjectRel(EMPNO=[+($0, 1)], Y=[-($0, 2)], EXPR$2=[+(+($0, 1), 3)]) TableAccessRel(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

TestCase.name: testSampleQuery

TestCase.Resource: select last_value(deptno) over (order by empno) from emp

ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[CAST(CAST($HISTOGRAM_LAST_VALUE($HISTOGRAM(CAST($7):BIGINT NOT NULL) OVER (ORDER BY $0 ROWS BETWEEN CURRENT ROW AND CURRENT ROW))):INTEGER NOT NULL):INTEGER]) TableAccessRel(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[CAST(CAST($HISTOGRAM_LAST_VALUE($HISTOGRAM(CAST($7):BIGINT NOT NULL) OVER (ORDER BY $0 ROWS BETWEEN CURRENT ROW AND 2 FOLLOWING))):INTEGER NOT NULL):INTEGER]) TableAccessRel(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])

ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[$0]) ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[3600000]) OneRowRel

TestCase.name: testOverAvg2
TestCase.Resource: select sum(sal) over w1, avg(CAST(sal as real)) over w1 from emp window w1 as (partition by job order by hiredate rows 2 preceding)

ProjectRel(EXPR$0=[CAST(CASE(>(COUNT($5) OVER (PARTITION BY $2 ORDER BY $4 ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW), 0), $SUM0($5) OVER (PARTITION BY $2 ORDER BY $4 ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW), null)):INTEGER], EXPR$1=[CAST(/(CASE(>(COUNT(CAST($5):REAL NOT NULL) OVER (PARTITION BY $2 ORDER BY $4 ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW), 0), $SUM0(CAST($5):REAL NOT NULL) OVER (PARTITION BY $2 ORDER BY $4 ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW), null), COUNT(CAST($5):REAL NOT NULL) OVER (PARTITION BY $2 ORDER BY $4 ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW))):REAL]) TableAccessRel(table=[[CATALOG, SALES, EMP]])
